attributes.action: Stop the BBC moving Doctor Who for Eurovision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This week (5th May) the BBC have decided to stop showing a flag-ship program to make space for EuroVision. EuroVision is a disgrace, with Countries voting for each other, and Sir Terry's remarks are at times embarrassing. Now is the time for the BBC to move EuroVision to a lesser channel, and keep Saturday night viewing constant.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
